fixes.name: NVega Up + Vega Up
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau calculated field "NVega Up + Vega Up" as a row-level calculated column in DAX by summing the underlying columns 'NVEGA_UP' and 'VEGA_UP' from the same table.

fixes.name: Vega & NVega Up USD
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression "[NVega Up + Vega Up]*[TO_USD]" to a DAX calculated column that multiplies the previously created calculated column 'NVega Up + Vega Up' by the 'TO_USD' column. This remains a calculated column because it is a row-level arithmetic calculation without aggregation.
